meanings.definition: The crowing of a rooster at dawn.
meanings.sent1: The loud cockcrows woke up the whole farm.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the familiar sound of cockcrows signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent3: The cockcrows were so loud, they even startled the sleepy cat.
meanings.sent4: As the first light appeared, the cockcrows pierced through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The cockcrows echoed across the valley, announcing the break of day.

meanings.definition: The time at which a rooster crows in the morning.
meanings.sent1: At the first cockcrows, the farmer knew it was time to start his day.
meanings.sent2: The village was always quiet until the familiar cockcrows filled the air.
meanings.sent3: The early cockcrows made the sleepyheads grumble about waking up so soon.
meanings.sent4: The cockcrows acted as nature's alarm clock, never failing to announce the sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic cockcrows marked the passing of time in the peaceful countryside.
